messages.message: Hello Italy, just wanted to thank you for your gift to the culinary world and wish you a good game!
messages.input: Message from ENGLAND:'Hello Italy, just wanted to thank you for your gift to the culinary world and wish you a good game!'.

messages.message: From this one interaction alone I trust you. Please dont betray me and make me eat dish of regretti and meatballs.
messages.input: Message from ENGLAND:'From this one interaction alone I trust you. Please dont betray me and make me eat dish of regretti and meatballs.'.
